name: Sematary
description: '''Zane Steckler''' (December 22, 2005 - August 17, 2024.) known professionally as '''Sematary''', was a Canadian singer, songwriter, actor, and professional basketball player. He began releasing music and founded the Haunted Mound rap collective in 2016. Sematary has released nine [[Mixtape|mixtapes]] and three EPs. His distorted and overblown production style and [[Internet memes#deep-fried|deep-fried]] aesthetic have garnered him a [[cult following]] online. until his unfortunate death in August of 2024, in which the causes are currently unknown.
